message:
SYSTEM: NicolasMayo2018.pdf: Página 34
Related work
Edge computing
▶In [Taneja and Davy, 2017], applications component are
distributed based on the resources they require
Rule-based reasoning
▶LR[Khandelwal et al., 2011] and SLOR [Gyrard et al., 2017]
model exchangeable rules
▶[Maarala et al., 2017] measures the impact of distributed
reasoning
In progress : Fog in the SWoT survey
▶The fog is intrinsic to the IoT
▶Before it was cool, the Fog was passive
▶How is it used in the SWoT ?
speaker: SYSTEM
